_header: Man beware of wicked counsel / He will thee lead…
Note: For other verses on this theme see 6410, 6481, 6684.

BodDig102.First Lines:
MAn be war of wikkid counsaileHe wol the lede in wayes
                    slidre…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…þe weye of grace and ȝe wol goLet wyt be lord aboue
                    ȝour wille
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 22-4.
